Query.Select: *[System[Provider[@Name='Microsoft-Windows-DNS-Client-DiagTrack' or @Name='Microsoft-Windows-DNS-Server-Service' or @Name='dns'] and (Level=1 or Level=2 or Level=3 or Level=4 or Level=0) and (EventID=409 or (EventID >= 501 and EventID <= 502) or (EventID >= 6001 and EventID <= 6002) )]]
